name: Go King
description:
[Single Play]
Three kinds of games supported by sequentially.
A.I Battle : Battle with A.I at 120 stages.
Groundwork Quiz : 800 Quiz in step by step.

[Multi Play]
Game Match with around the world up to 12 people.
Mini : Can learn the simple rules of Go on the map 9x9.
Classic : General rules of the game on the map 19x19.

[Features]
- Anytime you can take break during multiplayer.
- Support for tablet devices.
